Improvements.Description: The validate method is too long and does too many things. It's a good idea to refactor it into several smaller methods, each doing one specific validation. This improves readability and maintainability.

Improvements.Improvement: Use Set instead of List for uniqueness
Improvements.Description: For sessionTypes, sessionNames and subProfilerIds, you are using a List and manually checking if it contains an element before adding to it. Using a Set instead automatically ensures uniqueness and improves performance.
